text: @AshleyRParker Four months ago, I probably would have agreed. After waiting to exceed Millions of Confirmed #Covid19 cases, 136k plus deaths wearing a mask now just says he knows #TrumpIsLosing as are Americans as long as he occupies @WhiteHouse
